key_benefits.title: Third-Party Liability
key_benefits.description: Covers damage or injury caused to other people or property.

key_benefits.title: Own Damage Cover
key_benefits.description: Cover repair or replacement costs of the insured car.

key_benefits.title: Add-Ons
key_benefits.description: Options like zero depreciations, roadside assistance, and engine protection enhance coverage.

key_benefits.title: Cashless Claims
key_benefits.description: Convenient repairs at network garages with cashless service options.

IncludedAndExcluded.title: Included
IncludedAndExcluded.description: Third-party liability, accidental damage, theft, fire and optional add-ons (e.g., zero depreciation).

IncludedAndExcluded.title: Excluded
IncludedAndExcluded.description: Normal wear and tear, damages from intoxicated driving, mechanical/electrical failures, and unauthorized usage.

insurance_sub_categories.title: Third-Party Liability Insurance:
insurance_sub_categories.description: Covers damages caused to third parties in accidents and is legally required in many regions.

insurance_sub_categories.title: Comprehensive Car Insurance:
insurance_sub_categories.description: Provides full coverage, including both third-party liabilities and damages to the insured car.

insurance_sub_categories.title: Standalone Own Damage Cover:
insurance_sub_categories.description: Offers protection for damages to the insured car without third-party coverage.

insurance_sub_categories.title: Zero Depreciation Cover:
insurance_sub_categories.description: An add-on to cover the full cost of replacement parts without depreciation deductions.

insurance_sub_categories.title: Personal Accident Cover for Driver/Owner:
insurance_sub_categories.description: Provides financial protection for injury or death of the owner-driver in an accident.

insurance_sub_categories.title: Pay-as-you-Drive Insurance:
insurance_sub_categories.description: Flexible premiums based on usage and mileage, ideal for occasional drivers.

insurance_sub_categories.title: Commercial Car Insurance:
insurance_sub_categories.description: Specialized coverage for cars used for commercial purposes, like taxis and company cars.
